correct-1.description: File, class and methods are within the limit

correct-2.description: Trait, interface and enum are within the limit

incorrect-1.description: File, class and method exceed the limit

incorrect-2.description: Trait, interface and enum exceed the limit

incorrect-3.description: File, class and method exceed the limit that includes comments and blank lines

config-incorrect.description: Supplied config is incorrect (not a number)
